summary: Game is a concept that transforms work into an engaging adventure. It involves creating a playful environment, experimenting fearlessly, tracking progress like a game, and fostering team growth. This approach turns work into a fun, collaborative journey of continuous improvement and achievement. By incorporating elements of play and scoring, it enhances motivation and focus, making the workplace more enjoyable and productive. The game mindset encourages breaking and rebuilding ideas, promoting innovation and creativity in professional settings.
excerpt: Play To Work transforms your job into an engaging adventure. Start by defining your purpose, then create a playful environment. Experiment fearlessly, breaking and rebuilding ideas. Track progress like a game, keeping score to boost motivation.
